about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • Rank 14 suppression destroyer “Sirius”
  • Unique portrait “Lux Firewalker”
  • Coilgun

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

The first “people's destroyer” Sirius was developed and created during the mega-popular show “The Shipyard”, whose rating broke all records. For half a year, thirty engineers fought for the right to be called the “King of the Shipyard”, and the outcome of their battle was decided by the audience vote.

The army leadership did not initially believe in the success of the project, but gave permission to use one of its shipyards when the producers collected the required amount on the crowdfunding platform. To everyone’s surprise, Sirius turned out to be not only a high-quality, powerful and reliable machine, but at the same time — relatively inexpensive to manufacture. After the end of the show, Sirius was put into service, and its blueprints were transferred to the UMC.
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • Rank 14 suppression destroyer “Sirius”
  • Unique portrait “Lux Firewalker”
  • Coilgun

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

The first “people's destroyer” Sirius was developed and created during the mega-popular show “The Shipyard”, whose rating broke all records. For half a year, thirty engineers fought for the right to be called the “King of the Shipyard”, and the outcome of their battle was decided by the audience vote.

The army leadership did not initially believe in the success of the project, but gave permission to use one of its shipyards when the producers collected the required amount on the crowdfunding platform. To everyone’s surprise, Sirius turned out to be not only a high-quality, powerful and reliable machine, but at the same time — relatively inexpensive to manufacture. After the end of the show, Sirius was put into service, and its blueprints were transferred to the UMC.

name: Star Conflict - Sirius

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This pack includesRank 14 suppression destroyer “Sirius”Unique portrait “Lux Firewalker”Coilgun Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
